text: Hi, I am Niels from the Netherlands. I work at an agency and have been working with the HubSpot marketing tools for a while now. Recently I also started to develop templates in the HubSpot CMS and I am looking for some best practices for template development. I have used code editor and added some Hubl so content specialist can change the contents. Now I also would like to try to build templates using the drag and drop editor with custom modules, but I can't really find some best practices on what steps t take (apart from the academy course).

Good afternoon! My name is Mattias, and I'm a frontend developer based in Stockholm. I've been working with the HubSpot CMS for a couple of months now - and we've successfully launched our first client site just last week :clap: Currently working on more client projects, we're obviously doing something right to make both old and new clients excited about HubSpot!

Hi everyone! I'm Shelly Valentine from Cincinnati, OH! I am a HubSpot marketer turned developer. I've been using used the marketing software for several years and just implemented the CMS about a month ago at my company, <http://www.callibrity.com|www.callibrity.com>. Excited to get to WORK!:sprocket::muscle:
I am new to the HubSpot CMS, can I get the CMS developer sandbox for myself to play around and learn with even though my company already has the CMS in our account?
Yes you can, just sign up for it in the discovery kit, and if you don’t want it to be, it doesn’t have to be tied to your company email address
Ok cool. I signed up with my company address and it said you already have an account. I'll try with my personal email. Thanks!
